text_block_list.text:
Aaaaaah?! The pole… is gonna fall overrrrr!! 
N-no waaay～!
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A

text_block_list.text: Across the Tracen Academy grounds— a scream rang out.

The classes were competing against each other in "Pole Toppling". 
One team seemed to be on the verge of defeat…

Dangit～, no matter how many times we attack, we can't push deeper 
in to their camp?! What's with that strong guard～?
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A

text_block_list.text:
Aaaaah, the defense here is collapsing too～…! 
This is… impossible～!!
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B

text_block_list.text:
Everyone…!! 
Don't give up!!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
We can still recover from this!! Defense team, listen up! 
This is where we need to stand firm. Do your best to hold out.
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Three of you with confidence in your strength, follow 
me. If you can't hold out for long — we'll just 
have to push through before they can.
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Kita-chan, you plan to take them on from the front, huh? 
That's right, if it's Kita-chan…!
text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond

text_block_list.text:
Yeah, leave it to me! Ever since I was a kid I've 
carried those portable shrines that are way heavier 
than me…! Just watch me, Dia-chan!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Everyoooooone, follow meeeeee!! Let's win this together! 
Haaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
An unbelievable miracle occurred. She really 
did break through the defense and knock over 
the pole, a true come-from-behind victory.

That's our Kitasan! 
Yo, our rescue captain!
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B

text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, thanks! But this wasn't just because 
of me. We won because of everyone's efforts! 
Let's do our best in the next one too!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
As a trainer… that look in her eyes, the expression on her 
face, and that leadership made it hard not to admire her.

Hey hey, you over there, Trainer-kun!! 
Looks like that girl's got your attention, huh?
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text:
Kitasan Black, or Kita-chan for short! I'm looking forward to her 
future. Seeing how a girl that strong will become with training.
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text:
Fufuun, looks like you know about me. Well, I guess that's not 
surprising. If you hadn't heard of the invincible Teio-sama as a 
trainer, then you must have been living under a rock!
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text:
Kita-chan, I wonder what kind of Uma Musume she'll become. 
Before, she used to say she wanted to be like me though.
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: Aaah, Teio-saaaan!!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text: Did you see me out there? My running play?
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
It's still nothing compared to Teio-san but, 
while aiming for my debut, I've been giving my all everyday!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Yep, hopefully you can start running soon! Entering a selection 
race, and having someone become your trainer, too.
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text:
…Ah, that person next to you is a trainer, right? 
Nice to meet you, I'm called Kitasan Black!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
She gave a deep bow with her greeting. 
Seems like she's a very sincere Uma Musume.

Now that I think about it, Teio-san! I'm entering a mock race 
soon. On the same day as my childhood friend, Dia-chan!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
We're running in different races, but we promised that "We'll 
both win!". Um, if you're okay with it, will you come and watch?
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Yeah, of course! More importantly though, 
make sure you show me an amazing run, okay～?
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: She's caught my interest, so I'm also going to go watch.
And then — The day of the mock race.

I'll win, I'm gonna win. Just like usual, run in a tight crowd, 
and eventually they'll fall behind one by one…
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Wait, eh? Eh? Nobody's falling… behind?! 
No way, they're accelerating here…?!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Kitasan Black desperately chased after them. 
In the end… she barely made it in top 5.

Kitasan, good work～… We definitely thought if it was our 
Kitasan she'd win though… Were you feeling okay?
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A

text_block_list.text:
Huuuuuh…? I thought I could do it though～. 
Ah, Dia-chan's race is starting now…!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Next was Kitasan Black's childhood friend, 
Satono Diamond's turn to run.

This is… Tracen Academy's pace… It's just about how I 
thought. Just hold back for now. Not yet…
text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond

text_block_list.text:
—!! Here! From here in one shot — 
Yaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!
text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond

text_block_list.text:
She brilliantly pulled through and won. Satono Diamond had pulled 
ahead by a nose infront of the goal and claimed victory.

W-what happened, Dia-chan?! No, I mean, it's great that you won 
but… your running style was different from usual, wasn't it?
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
I was totally unable to run well this time, but um… 
did you do anything special this time around?!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Yeah… Tracen Academy races can't be compared to amateur ones. 
I understood that already so…
text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond

text_block_list.text:
I continued studying at home, just that. 
And also, I just did what my family and coach kept telling me.
text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond

text_block_list.text:
With everyone's help I kept preparing. "To someday become a 
strong Uma Musume that can win a G1". That's not just my dream.
text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond

text_block_list.text:
It's also my family's dearest wish. From back then and up to this 
day, we've kept aiming for that. Before I was even born…
text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond

text_block_list.text:
That's why, I'm just a little relieved. What I wanted 
to fulfill, for that dream that I have to fulfill no 
matter what, I've taken one big step forward.
text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond

text_block_list.text: Dia-chan…
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text: (I always thought… that we were both the same…)
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
(Playing together in the same way, competing against each other, 
supporting each other, always at the same time. But…)
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
(…but I was wrong. After the sun had set and we parted ways… 
Dia-chan, you were spending that time differently from me…)
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
(To win today — for your family, for your family's desire. 
That's why Dia-chan won, and I…)
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Kitasan Black continued to blankly stare off in to the distance. 
She was standing there in frustration.

Maybe it was a bit rude but, I felt something strongly from the 
expression of defeat on her face. "This Uma Musume is incredibly 
brave, and awe-inspiring"

I… wasn't… looking… 
I didn't understand anything…
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
But— But— from now on! 
I may have lost today, but—!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Y-yeah?! 
Oh, you're that trainer from before, aren't you?
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
As if I was charmed by her, and in awe of her- 
I couldn't help calling out.
choice_data_list: Will you let me be your trainer?
Will you let me be your trainer?

text_block_list.text: Eh? Eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeehhh?!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
